ImyaTweaks.Title: Change the Range of all NW Corner Markets.
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can Increase or Decrease the Ranges of all NW Corner Markets on Land and Water

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom FullSatisfactionDistance for Corner Markets NW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the FullSatisfactionDistance for the Corner Markets in the NW ( Mod default settings = 25 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom NoSatisfactionDistance for Corner Markets NW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the NoSatisfactionDistance for the Corner Markets in the NW ( Mod default settings = 50 )
